wikipedia_page.main: Marie Jeanne Wright (1862 – 1 May 1949) was a British stage and film actress. She was born in Dover and died in Hendon.

response: In Pimlico, London, Alice Barlow (Marie Wright) is murdered by an unknown man, who then ransacks her house, ripping her furniture apart as if desperately searching for something. The house remains empty for many years, until newlyweds Paul and Bella Mallen move in. Bella (Diana Wynyard) soon finds herself misplacing small objects; and, before long, Paul (Anton Walbrook) has her believing she is losing her sanity. B. G. Rough (Frank Pettingell), a former detective involved in the original murder investigation, begins to suspect him of Alice Barlow's murder.
|Silver Top||George King||Marie Wright, Betty Ann Davies||Crime||

response: Silver Top is a 1938 British crime film directed by George King and starring Marie Wright, Betty Ann Davies, David Farrar and Marjorie Taylor.BFI.org It was made at Shepperton Studios as a quota quickie.Chibnall p.297
